metadata.name: Tap Installer Execution
metadata.comment: Well-known TAP software installation. Possible preparation for data exfiltration using tunneling techniques

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\tapinstall.exe')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\program files\\\\avast software\\\\secureline vpn\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\program files (x86)\\\\avast software\\\\secureline vpn\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\program files\\\\openvpn connect\\\\drivers\\\\tap\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\program files (x86)\\\\proton technologies\\\\protonvpntap\\\\installer\\\\'))))

output.summary: Well-known TAP software installation. Possible preparation for data exfiltration using tunneling techniques
